summary: Summon An Invulnerable Clone Of Yourself
descriptionHtml:
Summon Player Book

This Mod Adds A Spell Book.
The Book Can Be Made At A Tanningrack.
You Will Need The Book Of The Dragonborn And 5 Gold Ignots.
The Book Of The Dragonborn Is The One U Find In The Helgen Keep With The Dragon Logo On It.

It Teaches A New Conjuration Spell Called \'\'Summon Player\'\'.
With This Spell You Can Summon An Invulnerable Clone Of Yourself.
For 8 Minutes He/She Can Guide You In Battle.

Works For Both Genders And All Races.
Works With Custom Skin Tones And Hairmodels Ect.

A Sidenote:

Sometimes There Is A Glitch.
When There Are Holes In The Players Head (The One Your Controlling).
All U Have To Do Is Re-equip An Item From The Apparel Section And It Is Fixed.
This Only Happens The First Time U Use The Spell.

Update:

A Light Version Has Been Made By Request.
Some People Found The Original One Overpowered (It Is So :P).
For This One You Need 2 Deathbell And An Iron Helmet.
This Version Lasts 60 Seconds And The Clone Is Still Invulnerable.

How To Install: Put The File In The Skyrim Data Folder.
author: JP0005

files.name: Summon Player Light Book - Toned Down
